metadata.title: CVE-2021-40403 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the pick-and-placerotation parsing functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd),and Gerbv forked 2.8.0. A specially-crafted pick-and-place file can exploitthe missing initialization of a structure to leak memory contents. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40403` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gerbv - 2.6.1-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gerbv package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
